front.title: Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Registration of Instant Messaging SRV Protocol Label registry for SIP/SIMPLE protocol.

abstract.t: This document registers with the IANA a new Instant Messaging SRV Protocol Label registry for SIP/SIMPLE protocol as specified in Address Resolution for Instant Messaging and Presence. This SRV Protocol Label indicates SIP/SIMPLE protocol as a protocol that will be used to instantiate the instant messaging or presence operations.
